mapper.insert:
select SURVEY_LIST_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into SURVEY_LIST (SURVEY_ID,SURVEY_NAME, SURVEY_CONTENT, ANONYMITY_CHECK_CODE,SURVEY_STATR_DATE,SURVEY_CLOSED_DATE,DECIDE_CHECK) values(#{surveyId},#{surveyName},#{surveyContent},#{anonymityCheckCode}, #{surveyStartDate},#{surveyClosedDate},#{decideCheck})
